alert.note: Alert for Sherman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 5:01PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Kit Carson and southwestern Sherman Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 401 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Kanorado, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Kit Carson and southwestern Sherman Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
